intro: Heeria benguellensis, commonly known as the Cape heeria, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It has opposite, ovate leaves that are usually hairy underneath. Heeria benguellensis is often found in rocky outcrops and coastal areas, thriving in well-drained soils.
